item.title: Reads
item.description: These are readings I would like to remember and come back to from time to time and will be updated on occasion. The bus ticket theory of genius A trilogy on human genetics Our vast, shared family tree Your ancestors lived all over the world Where did your genetic ancestors come from? Beware adaptationist story-telling: The spandrels of San Marco The viruses that made us human
